title: Ranked should take normals into account for fresh 30's
body:
Because holy shit. This is my jungler right now. Hes playing in silver 2 ranked :D 0-4! Keeping up the match history trend. people like this should not be allowed to play ranked. Sorry but this is straight up griefing. 

https://gyazo.com/41713863b3bf1f47d6cc25a66f68c73f?token=5920faa32c0256065e2e9ac839aeaf70
